duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all activities and functions related to GL Accounting Operations including the month-end close process, reconciliations, and analytical review.
Lead a team focused on accounting activities related to general ledger accounting functions such as cash, intercompany, prepaids, and accruals.
Prepare support for monthly and quarterly reporting in applicable areas and ensure execution of key controls in compliance with SOX internal controls and documentation requirements.
Analyze complex financial data, identify trends, and make informed recommendations for process improvements.
Present financial information clearly and effectively to stakeholders at various levels.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance (or equivalent)
Certified Public Accountant (CPA) designation is required
